summary: The module supplies factory utilities for assembling Keras-based image classification pipelines in Raster Vision, including creation of a ResNet50 model, selection and configuration of optimizers from protobuf settings, and construction of a trainer that ties together the model, optimizer, and training parameters.
business_intent: Facilitate configurable, reproducible deepâ€‘learning workflows for geospatial image classification by abstracting model, optimizer, and trainer setup, allowing users to quickly deploy and train classification models on satellite or aerial imagery.
